FusionEngine::FusionPhysicsProperties[depreciated] Overcomplication - only the response needs to be polymorphic. Holds data about a physical object
FusionEngine::FusionPhysicsResponseEach body can have a derived class for different collison responses :D
FusionEngine::FusionPhysicsTerrainAn implimentation of PhysicsBody. Handles bitmask based collisions
FusionEngine::FusionPhysicsWorldThe controller for moving objects - this takes data (eg. velocity, force) from Bodies and moves them (the bodies do no movement themselves.)
FusionEngine::FusionProjectileHolds all state information for each projectile
FusionEngine::FusionSceneFusionScene provides easy memory management for FusionNodes
